column4: Question : I haven installed many of programs using apt-get, and also removed them, coming from windows xp, i know that uninstall's sometimes leave bullshit folders and stuff you dont need.. is there a way to view and remove these...
if you use the --purge switch it will remove config files and miscellaneous other crap that programs leave behind.
for example instead of "apt-get remove package-name" you'd do "apt-get --purge remove package-name"
: damn thanks.. wish i woulda known that.
